DOC.brief_summary: to determine the safety, efficacy and tolerability of transdermal fentanyl in patients undergoing mastectomy, as well as the postoperative consumption of analgesic.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Transdermal Fentanyl Patches in Relief of Acute Postoperative Pain After Mastectomy
DOC.criteria: ASA I II patients aged 3060 years body weight ranged between 6510kg Patients with history of allergy to morphine chronic intake of analgesics or nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug 24 h prior to surgery, there was a history of a psychiatric disorder patients weight was less then 50kg. impaired kidney function.
